metadata.Title: CVE-2018-0499 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
A cross-site scripting vulnerability inqueryparser/termgenerator_internal.cc in Xapian xapian-core before 1.4.6exists due to incomplete HTML escaping by Xapian::MSet::snippet().

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-0499` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libxapian30 - 1.4.5-1ubuntu0.1
xapian-examples - 1.4.5-1ubuntu0.1
xapian-tools - 1.4.5-1ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: xapian-core package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.4.5-1ubuntu0.1').
